{{champion:254}} Punch! Punch! POWER SLAM!!! Oh man this suit is amazing. I never though punching things in a suit can feel this good. I may have to keep this. 



{{champion:86}} But Miss Vi. Doesn't that suit belong to Jayce? What will he wear then if you take his suit?


{{champion:254}} Mmmm...I know, he can wear my Neon Strike outfit. 



{{champion:86}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:44}} That outfit? *imagining Jayce in the outfit* 



{{champion:126}} Feels like I am wearing nothing at all. nothing at all. NOTHING AT ALL!!!



{{champion:86}} {{champion:5}} *shivering*



{{champion:44}} ......Think I can borrow that Neon Strike outfit?

I hate when a skin you own comes on sale, cause when you then play that champion with that skin, I feel like people assume that you JUST bought that skin, when in fact you bought it over a year ago

Dear Riot,

During a period of a few weeks from last December to early this February, all four of Cassiopeia's skins were featured on sale at one time or another. Since February, Cassiopeia has not had a skin sale. Since the new Gameplay Update in Patch 4.16, I am really enjoying the new Cass and I would really appreciate it if you could put her skins back into the upcoming rotations. 

Thanks!

You're welcome.

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/lv?key=0Arh3w_1KfCECdEl3UUUyZ0pFSFBWcmpaTDVfa1lBUGc

I have a new idea for a new game mode: Doom Urf: Where there are people with the URF buff and your against doom bots like everyone wanted but then there is a Doom Urf that patrolls the river and if its in the top river area and someone goes on to the bot lane river then he will go and slide across mid lane killing all the minions he hits and pushing the champions he hits taking out half their health and pushing them all the way to where he is going but the good thing that comes from the Urf is that if you kill it you get 100% cooldown reduction instead of 80% but if its a doom bot that gets it your dead LOL so yeah riot you should make this your next game mode.
